review: interesting story with simple choices that have big impacts

the main loop of this game is learning how the alien lifeforms behave and grow so you can fill the caves with more biomass the lore dialogue and story is interesting throughout and kept me invested the gameplay becomes repetitive unfortunately but the game is not that long so i can recommend this for its interesting setting though its not a strong recommendation

fun enough but definitely feels more like a mobile game i think it does have a mobile port if you like the puzzle style youll love it i was neutral on it so i called it quits after 2 or so hours but its because i think i got a good idea of the rest of the game based on my experience
a nice simple and short adventure well it took us 12 years mr biscuit but i finally finished it i finally know wtf it is it was fun
this is a great exploration game with fun jet pack physics to get all the biomes to level 5 can be quite tricky but its a fun puzzle to get the numbers up
i didnt know what to expect from this but ended up really loving it its gardening on mars grow a little ecosystem solve a mystery the story is simple but fun with great voice acting

im a huge sucker for games on mars  i originally played the mobile version and i think this is one of the few early mobile ports that wasnt complete garbage  its pretty cool if youre into mars  theres a bit of a story but it feels rather lackluster  its just cool to explore the inside of these caves and find alien life

its been a few years since i bought this game i fell in love with it at first try and i still enjoy the game so much today i hope the team behind this make a second game and we get to explore another planet grow more complex habitats and continue to explore with the aid of robots and cool scientists   such a wonderful enjoyable and rewarding journey to play this game from start to end
masterful in every way possible
good game more to it than the first 20 minutes make it seem you solve a bunch of puzzles in the theme of creating small simple ecosystems i liked the voicework a lot
lots of fun really lovely concept could be a little sharper with come controls but easy to play and fun to finish
gardening on mars  well done indie game interesting story fun mechanics and very relaxing atmosphere recommened
great story

work smoothly beautiful graphic love the scifi lovely voice actor and ost awesome game

beautiful little story driven game
great little game super chill and satisfying bringing life back to a dormant planet
numerous characters each with their own unique story
almost a gardentending simulator its fun to puzzle out the interactions between alien flora and fauna to maximize the size of your gardens i think the closest thing ive played has been the void

this is a great short little medroidvanialight game  the story was interesting and the voice acting was quite good  recommend is you want a short laid back game
i really recommend this game the campaign is great with a lot of great puzzles
good fun game unfortunately i got stuck on a level and i dont see a way to restart the game
fun little scifi game the ending is quite strange but still the experience is enjoyable
one of my favourite games even with how short it is
fond memories of this one i need to play it again
you jump around and people talk to you i guess
this game is fun although it can also be frustrating sometimes its a 2d game where you explore mars a do puzzles to progress the story its not long
odd conrols boring gameplay clunky platforming  if that sounds bad thats because its bad

first off let me say that the characters icons are some of the most emotive ive ever seen in games it was great seeing them smile and have so many different facial expressions  and i surprisingly enjoyed the game the story was nice and it was fun trying to figure out how to max out the area you were in its also pretty easy to get all the achievements if thats your thing  id enjoy more games that were similar to this made by the same people

interesting calm scifi game the first time i played it i got confused and thought i was stuck so i gave up but i just gave it another try 7 years later and was pleasantly surprised a little bit tedious to get the secret ending and i think its a stretch to call it a secret ending it just takes a bit longer overall good game
i have played this game before on mobile and have completed it a few times before i just wanted to leave a review because i think this game is really special
short

this is a great little puzzle platformer with competent voice acting and fun mechanics  its not the longest game in the world and i found myself hankering for even more complex alien ecosystems and perhaps a more open world but its a satisfying game nonetheless
took a while to get into its very simple but the mechanics are not too bad and the story is quite engaging wouldnt buy it on purpose but if you get it in a bundle like i did its worth a crack

iwaking marsi is a good and interesting twist on the metroidvania platformer in the earlytomidgame  it starts getting a little tiresome in the endgame however where you spend more time just running back to earlier areas and planting things than exploring
fun game with unique mechanics and a strong exploration aspect the fixed camera in some rooms often didnt mix well with keyboardmouse controls

one of the first exploration games i played that wasnt about exploiting resources  travel a martian underground and help the life you find flourish by carefully balancing the needs of the various inhabitants
its fun

a fun light puzzleplatformer game with solid voice acting an interesting concept nurturing and balancing ecosystems on mars and a story that has a gradually unfolding mystery if youre interested in playing out a possible scenario for discovering life on another world while exploring cave systems this should be a fun choice to spend some time on
its a solid game would recommend it to those who like farming sim type games with an emphasis on adventure
short and simple with an interesting mechanic

a relaxing game about planting seeds in a cave on mars for science has some puzzley elements and some hazards to avoid but none of it is very difficult i loved how the game focused on science for the sake of curiosity
even if a little bit old this game is worth it  really good gameplay
great gameexploring the planet mars is awesome
great gameplay loop and fun to experiment with the mechanics
not very attractive but interesting  recommended

this is a very unique game that puts the player creating life instead of destroying it thats right instead of shooting against hostile enemy life forms the player has to plant and create more lifeforms in order to open doors and proceed gameplay is fairly simple and youll get the hang of it quickly good game to chill
nice short game
memorable scifi adventure original gameplay and style great sountrack among other things really something to experience
mindful atmospheric systemsbased semipuzzler expect bouts of frantic gardening amongst the calm

surprised by how much i liked it the story and voice acting is the best part gameplay is just alright ive reached a point where it seems i no longer have enough seeds to continue my only alternative may be scouring previous levels for plants that i havent harvested from yet still a positive review just dont be haphazard with your plant use and enjoy the story
woke some plants up woke some creatures up woke mars up and then guess what  a woke game in a really good way
a nice casual game where you follow a simple task of making mars a lively ecosystem in its caves

an unconventional sciencefiction puzzle platformer no not really a metroidvania the way some describe it  theres no real progression of abilities not very long but definitely enjoyable

this game has been a nice surprise no violence no killing it is all about exploration and scientific discovery learning and restoring an ancient dormant ecosystem a good sciencefiction story epic in its own way i played it with my kids i recommend

a nice mellow explorationpuzzleplatformer featuring very nice stillframe portraits of the characters excellent voiceacting an intriguing story and an adorable ai sidekick who steals the show every time he pipes up definitely worth your while

i enjoyed exploring bringing life to and especially solving the mystery of lethe cavern the rooms branch and meet again several places which probably created a better feeling of exploration but it also made me miss several rooms and the lore they contained by the time i got to the ending when you enter the core just check the map to make sure you got everything
a game where you create life beautiful i highly recommend playing this game
a fun game with good vibes simple as that

very charming

great replayability  i enjoy the pseudo openworld where youre not being rushed to defeat a boss or beat the timer  id much rather explore with science and discover new life than shoot machine guns and throw grenades

great game better plot then most fun mechanics which also form part of the plot great audio great visuals only openended platformer i can recall playing i dont usually enjoy platformers wish theyd made another one cant believe i play as many games as i do and never heard about this until a few days ago

1010 real good underground gaming culture
a great little game its a refreshing change from the usual murderous shootem ups its nice to play such a relaxing game thats about creating life rather than destroying it

wow this is a great game very well designed with a great storyline and narrative its laid back and easy in that it pretty well walks you through how to play while still having plenty of challenge and tons of freedom as to what route you want to take and how you will progress definitely worth the purchase
im not usually one for game like this but its pretty great super engaging its about 6 hours of game play to get 1055 completion

a very good game in indie genre focused on more of a story aspect but still its gamplay is sound

this game is good casual fun  its nothing ground breaking or extrordinary but the art is beautiful and the game play is challenging withoug being rediculously hard  the characters are fun with banter and humor though the voice actring is a bit hammy  the two human characters are an asian man and black woman so bonus for representation  3  the creatures are creative and interesting though not james camerons avatar creative  this game is fun  i have no complaints

this is one of the best games from its genre it blends exploration with great story creating a compelling plot and walkthrough for the player  game mechanics changes sort of over time like when you get a permanent upgrade for your jetpack game dynamics does not so much got this game for android too overall 1010 a childfriendly walk in mars caverns with possibility to encounter alien life forms lovely

an intrigueing story flows throughout this game you fly around with your jetpack balancing simple ecosystems room by room to solve the mysteries of mars its a short playthrough little over seven hours and there are some glitches youll probably need to edit the ini to turn lightmapping off or the game will crash on launch and there are some early on audio glitches overall though an enjoyable little game

waking mars is a scientific scifi explorer where you control an austronautresearcher trying to unravel the mysteries of life in mars  you end up receiving interesting biological concepts that would be applied to any biome in the universe and also engage in some fine platforming and resourcebased puzzlelike gameplay such game play tends to drag on in later levels and become repetitive but the lingering mystery feeling always carries on and can keep players interested throughout
a good metroidvania to explore during a couple of evenings enthralling story and believable lifeforms
pretty cool scifi adventure game recommended on sale voice overs are very nice  httpswwwyoutubecomwatchv6vk7zyopts

waking mars is a game about both worldbuilding and well building a world lethe caverns ecosystems are full of nuance that were so fun to learn about explore and manipulate dr liang amani and art have an excellent dynamic and pleasant voiceacting to boot i highly recommend it to anyone who appreciates a good story science and has 10 to spare its like metroid if your goal was to propagate alien life instead of destroying it
i beat this game long ago and it was really good  both ending
interesting little game with a nice relaxed pace
its basically a non violent metroidvania the gameplay is very original and engaging recommended very unique
awesome and smart adventure thank you the podcast about science that recomend this science game

highly recommended you need to explore and understand the caves and living organisms inside to be able to advance trough the game the story is a lot more engaging and intriguing than i thought learning about the ecosystem was fun difficulty is manageable not frustrating jetpack is easy to move around  it has different endings and took about 8 9 hs of gameplay to get them not rushing i wish it was longer because i honestly loved it
pretty good game

ecosystem simulation  scifi story  nice graphics whats not to like

deserves to be bought you wont regret it if you like some adventure in a space environment just right inside our beloved neighbour mars  for what it costs right now dont even bother to think of not buying this great peace

another one of a kind indie game with an interesting idea and well done gameplay if you can get past puzzle ecosystem moments which are easy to solve but kinda slow and arent very enjoyable after few locations a great story and unique atmosphere awaits you waking mars is also very cheap up to 90 off on sales so wait for one and be sure to give this game a try

waking mars is simply a fun puzzle   i loved the voice acting animations  and music  they all helped with immersion   i played through on normal difficulty and completed the game within 12 hours of playtime  the higher difficulties will undoubtedly increase that number as the math for the bioforms must be more precise overall a great casual game
